install.title: Download Kaitu Client
install.autoDownloadCountdown: Download will begin automatically in {seconds} seconds
install.checkDownloadLocation: Please check your Downloads folder for the installation file
install.runInstaller: Please run the downloaded installer to complete installation
install.downloadFailedMessage: Auto-download failed, please try manual download.
install.useDesktopVersion: Please use the desktop version for now
install.helpBrowserBlock: • If your browser blocks the download, please allow downloads from this website
install.helpWindowsInstall: • On Windows, you may need to allow the app through Windows Defender
install.helpMacosInstall: • On macOS, you may need to allow the app in Security & Privacy settings
install.helpSecurityWarning: • If you see a security warning, our app is safe - this is because we haven't completed code signing yet
